function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High adoption level of protective behaviors","Impact":"Reduced risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure sustained adherence to protective behaviors","Technologies":"Behavioral interventions, public health campaigns","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Potential response bias in study participants","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of behavior adoption","Mitigation":"Use validated measurement tools, consider potential bias in analysis","Technologies":"Survey validation tools, statistical analysis techniques","People":"Research team, survey designers","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Variations in disease contexts and measurement tools","Impact":"Difficulty in comparing behaviors across populations and studies","Mitigation":"Standardize measurement tools, consider contextual factors in analysis","Technologies":"Standardized measurement scales, statistical analysis software","People":"Researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions"}]}
